pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
2d_rayleigh_benard: I suggest that we fix a random seed so that you always get the same simulation every time (same with 3D problem). Can we also switch to another timestepper that we like better? RK443?

3d_rayleigh_benard: Using greek letters is fun, but causes problems on some computers, so I think we should remove the epsilon.

Also, the example notebooks (i.e., the ones explaining bases, fields, operators, etc.) haven't been updated yet.  Are we waiting to update them after this PR?
